main.java

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the functions pertaining to the database, including creating a database, opening a connection to the database, closing the connection to the database, executing an insert/delete sql statement, and executing an sql query.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.sql.Connection conn
      The connection to the database
      static java.sql.Statement state
      The statement to be executed on the database

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static boolean connect(java.lang.String url)
        Used when creating/loading databases. Will set up a connection to the database
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the database
        Returns:
        True if the database was successfully opened, false if an exception occured when opening the database

      • connect

        public static void connect()
        Used when using search options for profiles. Will set up a connection to the database

      • close

        public static void close()
        Closes the connection to the database

      • createDatabase

        public static void createDatabase(java.lang.String url)
        Will create the database and tables of the database
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the database

      • executeUpdate

        public static void executeUpdate(java.lang.String sql)
        Takes an SQL statement sent in as a parameter and executes that statement. Use this for the insert, update, and delete functions
        Parameters:
        sql - An SQL insert, update, or delete statement that will be executed on the database

      • searchQuery

        public static java.sql.ResultSet searchQuery(java.lang.String sql)
        Takes an SQL statement sent in as a parameter and executes that statement. The resulting set will then be returned. Use this for a search query
        Parameters:
        sql - An SQL query statement that will be executed on the database
        Returns:
        ResultSet The resulting data returned from the search query

      • saveProperties

        public static void saveProperties(java.lang.String url)
        Saves the properties to the config.properties file
        Parameters:
        url - The database URL to be saved in the properties file

      • loadProperties

        public static java.lang.String loadProperties()
        Loads the properties from the config.properties file
        Returns:
        database URL stored in the properties file
